article.title: Status and history for fra
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: Removed a couple of extraneous commas in the last article.

The official record of the Declaration (in English and French) is available from the UN site, at , and the French version at the UNHCHR site contains a small differences. Our text has been corrected to accurately reflect the official record. Thanks to Benjamin Titze for pointing this out.
[Eric Muller] content, characters and PDF are clean.
[Eric Muller] restored the accents on capital letters (É in États). restored a few missing «.»
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
